TextView.n1:text: Specifications of Ford Mustang Choose Variant V8 (Petrol) 74.62 Lakh*V8 (Petrol) 74.62 Lakh* *Ex-showroom price in New Delhi Ford Mustang Front View Ford Mustang Side View Key specifications of Ford Mustang V8 (Petrol) Ex-showroom Price New Delhi Rs 74,62,000Finance Quotes Mileage (ARAI) kmpl 7.46 kmpl Mileage (City) kmpl 4.6 kmpl Fuel Type Petrol Engine Displacement 4951 cc BHP 395bhp@6500+-50rpm Torque 515Nm@4250+-50rpm Advertisement From Authorized Ford dealers Technical specs of Ford Mustang V8 (Petrol) All variants of the Ford Mustang are pretty much feature-laden and full of the expected technical specs. Engine specification include an engine of 4951cc, which musters up a torque measuring to 515Nm@4250+-50rpm and maximum power of 395bhp@6500+-50rpm. Mustang top model coughs out an average or giving an overall mileage of around 6 kmpl, with a fuel efficiency within a city of 4.6 kmpl and on highways the mileage stands out as 7.46 kmpl. Ford Mustang Automatic comes in petrol engine options.
